mapper.insert: insert into eco_challenge(eco_challenge_id, eco_challenge_name, prime_rate, start_date, end_date, limited_people) values(eco_seq.nextval,#{ecoChallengeName},#{primeRate},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{limitedPeople})
mapper.update: update eco_challenge set eco_challenge_name = #{ecoChallengeName}, prime_rate = #{primeRate}, end_date = #{endDate}, limited_people = #{limitedPeople}, content = #{content}, challenge_image =#{challengeImage} where eco_challenge_id = #{ecoChallengeId}
mapper.select: select eco_challenge_id, prime_rate, eco_challenge_name, start_date, end_date, limited_people, is_delete, challenge_image, total_count from eco_challenge where eco_challenge_name like '%' || #{value} || '%'
